unnormalised: Okay, mhonnllear, Bharotantlea time zone-anchem hishob korop mhonnllear puro head-scratcher zavonk xakta, kiteak? Khas korun tumchea lagim soglleakodde lokanchi vostu samanjos korunk sodhta tea vellar. Mhaka dista, apunn odhikrutpan 1 time zone-ach asa – Bharoti Promann Vel (IST), jem GMT+5:30 asa. Punn sury kesin, udentichea lagim, Guwahati-chea kodden, udentichea lagim, way earlier utthta, toxench okhantichea lagim, Mumbai mhonnllear.
normalised: Okay, mhunnllear, Bharotantlea vellar zone sodun kaddop ekdom doko dukhpacho zavnk xakta, barabor? khas korun tum sogleak mellun vostu samke korun lokam vangdda korunk sodtalea vellar. Mhaka dista, amchea kodden ekuch official vellar zone asa - Indian Standard Time (I-S-T), jem G-M-T plus panch hor ani tis minute asa. Punn suryak udevacho vellar khoreaitharicher poleyar guwahati lagim udentek chodd poilim zalo, toxench ostomtek, mhunnllear mumbai lagim, kitlo ushir zalo.

unnormalised: Arunachal Pradesh-antlean Gujarat poriant soglle ekach vellar choltat mhonn chintop kitench crazy dista. Kalpo, northeast-antlea lokank poilimuch tancho sakallecho chai aasa zatlea vellar Rajasthan-achea thoddea bhagamni poriant puro kallokh asta! Assam ani WB-antlea kaim chai bagichea lokamni khorench "Chai Bag Vel" paloita mhonnllear, jem IST-antlean adho ghenntto fuddlean asta! Curve-achea fuddlean aschem kitem mhonnllear.
normalised: Arunachal Pradesh thavn Gujarat meren soglle ekech vellar choltat mhunn chintop thoddem pixeponnachi gozal asa. Kalpo, ut'tor-udentiche lok aplea sakallchea chaik astolea vellar Rajasthanant thoddea bhagamni puro andhar astolo! Assam ani W-B-antlea kaim chaichea baganim legit "Tea Garden Time" vaprotale, jem I-S-T thavn ordho vor fuddem aslem! Fuddem ravopachi gozal asa.

unnormalised: Ani magir puro dis uzvadd dovornnechi vostu asa. Apunn tem korina, odhikrutpan. Punn adlea kallant, 1962 Sino-Indian Zhuzh-chea vellar, 1965 Indo-Pak zhuzh, ani 1971 Indo-Pak zhuzh, tea vellar, te ghenntto ek ghenntto fuddlean gheta energy vachovnk. DST apnnak poddonk xakta mhonn apunn prayog kortale. The adjustment dor tem, zhuzh somptokuch, sometime pottlo zavnk lagta mhonn sangtat.
normalised: Ani magir daylight savingachi gozal asa. Ami tem korina, officially. Punn poilinchim disanim, nineteen sixty two Sino-Indian Zhuzache vellar, nineteen sixty five Indo-Pak zhuzache vellar ani nineteen seventy one Indo-Pak zhuzache vellar, te vortuk ek vor fuddem vaddoitale energy vachovpak. Tem dista ami D-S-T amchea khatir kamak yeta ki na tem polleunk prayog kortale. Hi samke korun duddovnni zalea uprant chodd korun harpavopant aili.

unnormalised: Khoreponnan, zaitea lokani, khaskarun north-eastern rajyantlea lokani, veglli time zone magtolo cholta. Say, Itanagar-antlea konnacho lagim meetings tharavnk kalpo, ani mentalpan fark ulloyit ravonk poddta mhonnllear. Tem tiring zata! Plus, proponents veglli time zone region-ant productivity vaddoita ani bijli vachoita mhonn sangtat.
normalised: Khorench, chodd lok, khas korun ut'tor-udentichea rajyamni, vegvegllea vellar zoneak dhakka divnk ravtat. Kalpo Itanagar-ant konnachea sangatak meeting sampddoitat ani tumak to vegllo kiteak asa tem mathyan korchem poddtta. Tem kantall dit. Ani, puraskarte sangtat ki vegvegllea vellar zoneak lagun utpadokta vaddoit ani energy vachovnk pavtot.

unnormalised: Punn sarkar puro hesitant cholta. Tankam chinta zata confusion utponn zatolem, khaskarun railways ani communication networks-ank. Plus, puro symbolic vostu asa – ek time zone dovornnen ekvott ghorjechem mhonn dakhoyta. Ani ek report mhaka vachonk mell'llea pormonnem, power vachonnacho bodol mhonnllear keval 2.7 million kWh per annum mhonn ankotta.
normalised: Punn sorkar thoddo sankochit asa. Te chintat ki tenvho gollmal utponn kortolo, khas korun railways ani communication networks khatir. Ani, ek simbholik gozal asa - ek vellar zone dovornni ekcharicher zor dita ki kainch. Ani mhaka vachunk mell'llea ek reporta pormannem, tea energy vachovpache vicharak don point sat million kilo watt vor dor varshik poddto.

unnormalised: So, atamchea vellar, apunn one-size-fits-all IST-ant bhair asa. Maglea vellar tum tumchea desachea vegllik bhagant konnacho lagim call arrange korta tea vellar, ghenntto ekach vostu sangta punn tancho dis puro veglli chalink start zavnk xakta mhonn yaad dovra! Ani tum ‘IST’ listed zata ten’n tem mhonnllear tum GMT-antlean 5 hours & 30 mins fuddlean asa mhonn yaad dovra.
normalised: Mhunnun, atechakhatir, ami ek-size-fits-all I-S-T-ant atkun poddlya. Fuddli vellar konnak vegvegllea bhagamni phone korpak sampddoitat tedna, yaad dovrat ki clock temuch sangta tori astana, tanchi disachi survat vegvegllea ritin zaunk xakta! Ani tum "I-S-T" ulekhun aikat tedna, yaad dovrat ki tem tum G-M-T thavn panch vor ani tis minute fuddem asa mhunn sangta.

unnormalised: Tumi tumcho sayankallin chai 7 PM IST-ak ghetlea vellar mhonnllear, konn dusro atamuch nhidoon poddla mhonn zanno zavnk puro vostu chintleleo asa! Cheers!
normalised: Fokot ek chintopachi gozal tumchea sandhyakallchea chaik saat P-M I-S-T-ant bhortana, konn tori nhidpak tayar astolo mhunn zannun! Cheers!
